ANU.name: Syarifah Liza Munira
interest: Vaccine supplyImmunization programsPharmaceutical industryEconomic evaluationBehavioral economicsInnovative financing
ANU.biography: Within her 20 years of experience working on policy and research at the national and international level, Liza’s work in economics and global health has covered various issues such as public health systems, immunization, the pharmaceutical and vaccines industry, tobacco control, resource mobilization, innovative financing, poverty reduction, and decentralization.
